description: This file defines the 'AttributeData' class, representing a data structure used to hold attribute-related information in a device cluster context, including id, type, success status, data length, data payload (base64 encoded), and manufacturer ID.

classes.name: AttributeData
classes.description: A data class that encapsulates attribute information such as id, type, success status, data length, data payload, and manufacturer ID in a device communication protocol.

methods.name: AttributeData (constructor)
methods.description: Initializes an AttributeData instance with id, type, and data byte array, encoding the data in Base64.

methods.name: AttributeData (constructor)
methods.description: Initializes an AttributeData instance with id, type, and data string, marking success as true.

methods.name: AttributeData (constructor)
methods.description: Initializes an AttributeData instance with id, type, data byte array, and manufacturer ID, encoding the data in Base64.

methods.name: AttributeData (constructor)
methods.description: Initializes an AttributeData instance with id, type, data string, and manufacturer ID, marking success as true.

methods.name: getMfgId
methods.description: Returns the manufacturer ID associated with this attribute, if any.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Returns whether the data retrieval was successful.

methods.name: getDataLen
methods.description: Returns the length of the data payload in bytes, decoding from Base64 if necessary.

methods.name: getRawData
methods.description: Returns the raw data payload as a byte array by decoding the Base64 string.
